name: Factory Madness: Build It
description:
The madness continues with ‘Factory Madness’ - the follow-up to ‘Office Madness’ and ‘Hospital Madness’. 

Harvest and mine unlimited valuable resources. Manufacture finished products. Research new resources and products. Sell them in online stock exchange. Check your income and expenditures carefully. Earn buckets of cash and get to the top of the rich list.   Join Daily and weekly events and by scheduling your production.   Be in the 1%, now!

Features

- Build Farms, Mines, Warehouse and Factory Bands
- Research 17 resources and manufacture 17 finished goods with these resources
- Hire employees and make an efficient production plan
- Join online events that will effect your goods price
- Buy and Sell your goods in online stock exchange market
- Challenge in online stock exchange feature that prices will be up and down instantly according to other players’ demand.
- Be the richest among other players
publishers: IYIFIKIR ELEKTRONIK HIZMETLER VE TICAET LTD STI
